metadata.title: CVE-2020-21676 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: A stack-based buffer overflow in the genpstrx_text() component in genpstricks.c of fig2dev 3.2.7b allows attackers to cause a denial of service (DOS) via converting a xfig file into pstricks format.

criterions.comment: fig2dev package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
